Talk10:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>That biiig mountain over there is <clr:0000>Satori
Mountain<clr:ffff>! <sp:5:0:0>They say it's crawling with
rare bugs!
<sp:3:0:2:0a01>I, um...<sp:5:0:0> I love bugs, but it's hard to find
rare ones around here.

<sp:3:0:2:0801>That's why someday I wanna go to that
mountain and catch enough bugs to fill
up a ginormous rucksack!
Talk11:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:Happy>Also!<sp:5:0:0> The <clr:0000>beetle shopkeeper <clr:ffff>knows just
about everything you could ever wanna
know about bugs.
So you should definitely have him teach
you lots and lots!
Talk12:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>OK! If you ever wanna hear about it,
just let me know!
LargeHorse: I want a ride on that.
Talk13:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>Well, um...<sp:5:0:0>my mom and dad are always
busy, so my siblings and I try to help out!

<sp:3:0:2:0701>If you wanna learn about stuff at the
stable, try asking my brother and
sister outside.
Talk14:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy>My mom and dad are always busy, so my
siblings and I try to help out!

<sp:3:0:2:0701>If you want to hear more about the stable,
try asking my brother and sister outside.
Talk15:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I wanna catch a rare bug tomorrow.<sp:5:0:0>
Do you think...<sp:5:0:0>it might rain?
Talk03:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:SurpriseS_01>That's <clr:0000>Satori Mountain<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:0:0> They say it's
absolutely crawling with rare bugs!

<sp:3:0:2:0a01>I, um...<sp:5:0:0> I love bugs, but there aren't many
rare ones around here.

<sp:3:0:2:0801>So someday, I wanna go to that
mountain and catch enough bugs
to fill a huuuge rucksack!
Talk16:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:Sleep_01>Is this<sp:5:0:0> <clr:0000>Satori Mountain<clr:ffff>?!<sp:5:0:0> Here...<sp:5:0:0> There...<sp:5:0:0>
Rare bugs everywhere!
Talk17:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Sleep_01>Yay, it's raining...<sp:5:0:0> Look, a rare
<clr:0000>thunderwing butterfly<clr:ffff>. <sp:5:0:0>So pretty...
<sp:5:0:0>Zzz zzz...
Talk18:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Sleep_01>Rain...<sp:5:0:0> Lucky me...<sp:5:0:0> Come on out, <sp:5:0:0>rare
<clr:0000>electric darner<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:0:0> Zzz...
Talk19:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>So, listen. I dunno if you know, but...


You see it?<sp:5:0:0> The big mountain over there?
Talk06:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>The <clr:0000>beetle shopkeeper<clr:ffff> who comes here
knows eeeverything there is to know
about bugs.
So you should have him teach you lots
when he's here!
Talk07:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseM>Hey, it's you!<sp:5:0:0> Ah, whoops...


I'm supposed to greet all our customers
properly.<sp:5:0:0> Mom'll get mad at me again...
